channel.title: A notice for mods!
channel.description:
honestly? wtf? lowered rep by 3 for posting that and it was deleted? you guys honestly need to help? you guys have the most shit community ever cuz all u guys do is be dicks and shit and im standing up for players and you do that? im trying to help and improve this forums? not watch all u guys be dicks...? l2haveagoodcommunity, much? and honestly cole. lower my rep again and ill ddos you so fucking hard youll never have a computer again. guys.. honestly. all of you. you all need to stop. if i was the owner of this id ban anyone who did the shit you guys are doing? and btw do you think i dont care about this community or something? cuz i wouldnt be posting this if i didnt?
--- [still hates donated staff]---lovly---[2nd owner of BLU3$C4P3]

item.title: A notice for mods!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I should ban you for threatening to ddos us. I’ll just lock this thread though so we can all lol at your idiocy for years to come.

Read full topic

lower my rep again and ill ddos you so fucking hard youll never have a computer again. guys.

I just died of laughter
